parts: (a)    how much money the Ministry received from co-operating partners from 2007 to 2011, year by year; and
(b)    on what programmes the money was spent, province by province. W39    Mr Chisala (Chilubi) - to ask the Minister of Commerce, Trade and Industry:
(a)    which countries in the following continents had bilateral trade relationships with Zambia as of 31st March, 2012:
(i)    Europe; (ii)    Africa; (iii)    Asia; and (iv)    North America;
(b)    how many textile companies were operating in Zambia as of 31st March, 2012; and

(c)    how many food processing companies were operating in Zambia in the period at (b) above. W40    Mr Chisala (Chilubi) - to ask the Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education:
(a)    how many Zambian Government sponsored students were studying at various universities in the following countries as of 31st December, 2011:
(i)    United Kingdom; (ii)    United States of America; (iii)    Russia; (iv)    China;
(v)    France; (vi)    Germany; (vii)    Japan; (viii)    India; (ix)    Canada;
(x)    The Netherlands; (xi)    Ireland; (xii)    Italy; (xiii)    Norway; and (xiv)    Sweden; and

(b)    what the fields of study each student was pursuing.
